languages.text: {n}Некоторое время губернатор смотрит на бездыханное тело сына, почти не шевелясь. Дрожащими губами он произносит неожиданно твердо.{/n} "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость... Это несмываемый позор на лице моей семьи. Я надеюсь, что смогу искупить его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Испуганные вздохи проносятся по свите семейства Драйвстем. Некоторое время губернатор смотрит на бездыханое тело сына, почти не шевелясь. Дрожащими губами он произносит неожиданно твердо.{/n} "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость... Это несмываемый позор на лице моей семьи. Я надеюсь, что смогу искупить его".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время губернатор смотрит на бездыханное тело сына, почти не шевелясь. Дрожащими губами он произносит неожиданно твердо.{/n} "Благодарю вас, Ваша Светлость... Это несмываемый позор на лице моей семьи. Я надеюсь, что смогу искупить его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor watches the lifeless body of his son for some time, unmoving. With trembling lips he speaks up, with surprising hardness to his voice.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}Governor watches the lifeless body of his son for some time, unmoving. With trembling lips he speaks up, with surprising hardness to his voice.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor watches the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving. With trembling lips, he speaks up, in a surprisingly firm tone of voice.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The Governor watches the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving. With trembling lips, he speaks up, in a surprisingly firm tone of voice.{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}総督は生気を失った息子の身体を、身動きもせずにじっと見ている。そして突然、震える唇で、意外にもしっかりした声音を発する。{/n}「感謝いたします、陛下。これはわが家の恥です。この度の償いはさせていただきます」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は生気を失った息子の身体を、身動きもせずにじっと見ている。そして突然、震える唇で、意外にもしっかりした声音を発する。{/n}「感謝いたします、陛下。これはわが家の恥です。この度の償いはさせていただきます」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}总督一动不动地盯着自己儿子的尸体看了半晌。他的嘴唇抽动着，随后突然以令人诧异的镇定语气开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。这是整个家族的耻辱。我希望我能弥补他的罪过。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督一动不动地盯着自己儿子的尸体看了半晌。他的嘴唇抽动着，却以令人诧异的镇定语气开了口。{/n}“谢谢您，大人。这是整个家族的耻辱。我希望我能弥补他的罪过。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Figé, le gouverneur fixe longuement le corps sans vie de son fils. Quand enfin il prend la parole, sa voix est étonnamment ferme, mais vous voyez ses lèvres trembler.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. C'est une véritable disgrâce pour toute ma famille. J'espère pouvoir expier cette terrible faute. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Figé, le gouverneur fixe longuement le corps sans vie de son fils. Quand enfin il prend la parole, sa voix est étonnamment ferme, mais vous voyez ses lèvres trembler.{/n} « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. C'est une véritable disgrâce pour toute ma famille. J'espère pouvoir expier cette terrible faute. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}El gobernador contempla durante un tiempo el cadáver sin vida de su hijo sin apenas mover un solo músculo. Con labios temblorosos, habla con un tono de voz sorprendentemente firme.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esta es una deshonra para mi familia. Espero poder expiarla».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador contempla durante un tiempo el cadáver sin vida de su hijo sin apenas moverse. Con labios temblorosos, habla con un tono de voz sorprendentemente firme.{/n} «Gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Esta es una deshonra para mi familia. Espero poder expiarla».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur starrt eine Weile reglos auf den leblosen Körper seines Sohnes. Dann spricht er plötzlich mit zitternden Lippen, aber überraschend fester Stimme.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das ist eine Schande für meine Familie. Ich hoffe, ich kann Buße tun."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur blickt eine Weile reglos auf den leblosen Körper seines Sohnes. Dann spricht er mit zitternden Lippen, aber überraschend fester Stimme.{/n} "Danke, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das ist eine Schande für meine Familie. Ich hoffe, ich kann Buße tun."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: {n}Vali, kılını kıpırdatmadan oğlunun cansız bedenine bir müddet bakıyor. Ardından titreyen dudaklarını oynatıp şaşırtıcı derecede kararlı bir ses tonuyla konuşuyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müteşekkirim. Bu, hanemin hatıratına sürülmüş koca bir lekedir. Ümidimse bunu telafi edebilmektir."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor stares at the lifeless body of his son for some time, barely moving a muscle. With trembling lips, he suddenly speaks in a surprisingly firm voice:{/n} "Thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is a disgrace to my family. I hope I can atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, kılını kıpırdatmadan oğlunun cansız bedenine bir müddet bakıyor. Sonra aniden titreyen dudaklarıyla şaşırtıcı derecede kararlı bir ses tonunda konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müteşekkirim. Bu, hanemin hatıratına sürülmüş koca bir lekedir. Ümidimse bunu telafi edebilmektir."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
